vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Ἰωσήφ indecl.
(FlJ, Ἰώσηπος, -ου), ὁ (Heb. יוֹסֵף),
Joseph;
__1. the Son of Jacob: Jhn.4:5, Act.7:9, 13-14 7:18, Heb.11:21-22, Rev.7:8.
__2. In the genealogy of our Lord,
__(a) the son of Matthias: Luk.3:24;
__(b) the son Joram: Luk.3:30.
__3. The husband of Mary, the Lord's mother Mat.1:16 ff, Luk.1:27, Jhn.1:46, al.
__4. One of the brethren of our Lord (see: ἀδελφός): Mat.13:55.
__5. Son of Mary: Mat.27:56 (-σῆς, WH, mg., RV).
__6. Joseph of Arimatbæa: Mat.27:57, 59, Mrk.15:43, 45, Luk.23:50, Jhn.19:38.
__7. see: Βαρνάβας.
__8. see: Βαρσαβᾶς
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, first mentioned at Mat.1.16;
son of: Jacob (G2384); married to Mary (G3137);
father of: Jesus (G2424), James (G2385I), Joseph (G2500), Simon (G4613H) and Jude (G2455I)
vocabinfos._es_Definition: José: (1) hijo de Jacob el patriarca ; (2) esposo de María, madre de Jesús ; (3) de Arimatea, miembro del Sanedrín ; (4) hermano de Jesús (MAT.13:55) ; (5) sobrenombre Barnabás ; (6) hijo de María (MAT.27:56) ; (7, 8) personas en la genealogía de Jesús (LUC.3:24,30)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約瑟 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來字的意思是 "任他增添"
1) 族長之一, 雅各的第十一個兒子
2) 約南的兒子, 基督的祖先之一(路 3:30)
3) 猶大的兒子, 耶穌的另一個祖先(路 3:26)
4) 瑪他提亞的兒子, 另一位基督的祖先(路 3:25)
5) 耶穌的母親馬利亞的丈夫 (太 1:16)
6) 耶穌的兄弟約西 (太 13:55)
7) 亞利馬太的約瑟, 公會中的人, 是支持耶穌的人 (太 27:57,59;可 15:43,45)
8) 被稱作巴拿巴的約瑟 (徒 4:36)
9) 稱為巴撒巴的約瑟, 又叫作猶七都 (徒 1:23)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
约瑟这个阳性专有名词在希伯来字的意思是"任他增添"
1) 族长之一, 雅各的第十一个儿子
2) 约南的儿子, 基督的祖先之一(路3:30)
3) 犹大的儿子, 耶稣的另一个祖先(路3:26)
4) 玛他提亚的儿子, 另一位基督的祖先(路3 :25)
5) 耶稣的母亲马利亚的丈夫(太1:16)
6) 耶稣的兄弟约西(太13:55)
7) 亚利马太的约瑟, 公会中的人, 是支持耶稣的人(太27:57,59;可15:43,45)
8) 被称作巴拿巴的约瑟(徒4:36)
9) 称为巴撒巴的约瑟, 又叫作犹七都(徒1:23)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Mat.27.56; his mother was Mary (G3137H);
brother of: James (G2385J) and Salome (G4539); also called Joses at Mrk.15.40; 16.1;
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Mat.27.57

A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, only mentioned at Luk.3.24;
son of: Mattathias (G3161);
father of: Jannai (G2388)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time ofExile and return, only mentioned at Luk.3.26;
son of: Joda (G6043);
father of: Semein (G4584)

A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at Luk.3.30;
son of: Jonam (G2494);
father of: Judah (G2455J)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.30.24;
son of: Israel (H3478) and Rachel (H7354);
brother of: Benjamin (H1144);
half-brother of: Reuben (H7205), Simeon (H8095), Levi (H3878), Judah (H3063), Dan (H1835H), Naphtali (H5321), Gad (H1410), Asher (H0836), Issachar (H3485), Zebulun (H2074) and Dinah (H1783); married to Asenath (H0621);
father of: Manasseh (H4519) and Ephraim (H0669); also called Zaphenath-paneah at Gen.41.45;

vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Ἰωσῆς, -ῆ (Rec. -ή Luk.3:29; AV, Jose; see: Ἰησοῦς, 3), and -ῆτος (Mk, ll with), ὁ,
Joses;
__1. brother of our Lord: Mrk.6:3, Mat.13:55 (Rec., see: Ἰωσήφ).
__2. Son of Mary: Mat.27:56 (-σήφ), WH, txt), Mrk.15:40, 47
__3. see: Βαρνάβας.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.4.36; his mother was Mary (G3137P) ;
brother of: Mary (G3137L); also called Barnabas;
vocabinfos._es_Definition: José: (1) hermano de Jesús ; (2) hermano de Santiago/Jacobo el menor (MAR.15:40,47)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約西 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "被尊崇"
1) 基督的先祖 (路 3:29)
2) 耶穌的兄弟 (可 6:3)
3) 耶穌的姨媽也叫馬利亞,有個兒子叫約西 (太27:56; 可 15:40,47)
4) 早期教會成員之一, 但是以巴拿巴為人所知 (徒 4:36, 和合本此處譯作"約瑟")
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
约西这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是"被尊崇"
1) 基督的先祖(路3:29)
2) 耶稣的兄弟(可6:3)
3)耶稣的姨妈也叫马利亚,有个儿子叫约西(太27:56; 可15:40,47)
4) 早期教会成员之一, 但是以巴拿巴为人所知(徒4: 36, 和合本此处译作"约瑟")
